video.title: The Red Road
video.synopsis: In the wake of a terrible tragedy, a local sheriff forges a fateful alliance with a member of a Native American tribe, begetting grave consequences.

episodes.synopsis: Officer Jensen investigates a missing NYU student, while his own home erupts in chaos and an ex-con tribe member launches an illegal drug ring.
episodes.title: Arise My Love, Shake Off This Dream

episodes.synopsis: Her tragic incident with the Lenape boy triggers Jean's mind to snap, pushes Harold to supress key evidence and fuels Kopus to blackmail Harold.
episodes.title: The Wolf and the Dog

episodes.synopsis: Harold moves Rachel to his in-laws' house, where she discovers a family artifact. Kopus brings Junior into his drug operation.
episodes.title: The Woman Who Fell From the Sky

episodes.synopsis: Harold's deal with the Lenape tribe is tearing him apart, while Jean gets a revealing diagnosis and the NYPD has questions about the missing student.
episodes.title: The Bad Weapons

episodes.synopsis: Kopus' world crumbles after going after his father. Harold has enough leverage to call off their deal and The NYPD issues a warrant for his arrest.
episodes.title: The Great Snake Battle

episodes.synopsis: The audio tapes Rachel found reveal the truth about Jean's brother's death. Both Harold and Kopus must face the consequences of their decisions.
episodes.title: Snaring of the Sun
